name: ChatGPTWizard (AliDehbansiahkarbon)
description: [项目级] A ChatGPT, WriteSonic, YouChat, and Ollama(offline) plug-in for Embarcadero RAD Studio IDE XE5 to 12.1. https://getitnow.embarcadero.com/chatgptwizard。来源: https://github.com/AliDehbansiahkarbon/ChatGPTWizard

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A ChatGPT, WriteSonic, YouChat, and Ollama(offline) plug-in for Embarcadero RAD Studio IDE XE5 to 12.1. https://getitnow.embarcadero.com/chatgptwizard

来源: https://github.com/AliDehbansiahkarbon/ChatGPTWizard
语言: Pascal
Stars: 268

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CONTRIBUTING.md
ChatGptWizard.delphilsp.json
ChatGptWizard.dpk
ChatGptWizard.dproj
Delphinus.Info.json
Delphinus.Install.json
Forms
Forms/UAbout.dfm
Forms/UAbout.pas
Forms/UChatGPTProgress.dfm
Forms/UChatGPTProgress.pas
Forms/UChatGPTQFrame.dfm
Forms/UChatGPTQFrame.pas
Forms/UChatGPTQuestion.dfm
Forms/UChatGPTQuestion.pas
Forms/UChatGPTSetting.dfm
Forms/UChatGPTSetting.pas
LICENSE
Lexer
Lexer/ParserDefines.inc

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Free text question form.
- Dockable question form.
- Inline questions(in the editor).
- Context menu options to help you to find bugs, write tests, optimize code, add comments, etc...
- Class view(Code conversion, code optimizing, test units, and other options per class).
- Predefined Questions for class view.
- History to save your tokens on OpenAI!
- Fuzzy string match searches in the history.
- Animated letters(Like the website).
- AI Code Translator
- Proxy server options. 
- Supports [OpenAI](https://openai.com) ChatGPT as the main AI service.
- Supports [Writesonic](https://writesonic.
